title: Samurai Umbrella
description:
This Samurai umbrella suggests a link between ancient history and urban savvy.  You'll feel like a warrior against inclement weather carrying an umbrella cleverly designed to look like a Samurai sword.  Comes with a sleeve and attached shoulder strap to wear across the chest.  Molded plastic handle looks like a Samurai sword handle.  This non-collapsible stick umbrella has a push button open feature.

Closed; 39 x 3 in.
Open; 39 x 48 in. diam.

Additional Shipping $15 per Order.

This item cannot be shipped to a destination outside the United States.
